name: Famicom Yakyuu Ban
overview: Famicom Yakyuu Ban is a baseball game for the Famicom (NES), developed by SAS Sakata and published by Epoch in late 1989, and is the first Epoch-released game for a system they did not make themselves. It is based nominally on Epoch's Yakyuu Ban series of physical baseball toys, which used pinball mechanics to simulate batting.
